ADO DB Version: 4.64

Some little changes was made. Kicked unneeded files and folders:
- cute_icons_for_site (folder)
- docs (folder)
- prefs (folder)
- pear (folder)
- session (folder)
- tests (folder)
- in "drivers" folder all drivers without mysql and sqllite
- in folder "lang" all languages without geman, english and francaise
- in root folder zip package "adodb-time.zip"
